Who Heads NAEB?
National Officers and Directors are elected
by and from the membership.
National Headquarters and the NAEB
Radio Network employ a professional staff
headed by the Executive Director.
What is naeb?
The National Association of Educational
Broadcasters is a national professional
organization representing the interests, and
serving the needs of, educational radio and
tv, and teachers using these media as eduÂ¬
cational instruments.
Where is NAEB Headquarters?
14 Gregory Hall, Urbana, Illinois
When Was NAEB Organized?
It began in 1925 .... 34 years ago!
Why join?
This leaflet gives details of services and
benefits to you. Your membership
strengthens national effectiveness and
development of educational broadcasting.
